byline.original: Wireless to THE NEW YORK TIMES

snippet: MADRID, June 30--Reverting once again to Russia as the principal enemy of Nationalist Spain, the newspaper Arriba today expressed regret over the annexation of Bessarabia....

keywords.name: glocations
keywords.value: MEDITERRANEAN, AFRICA AND NEAR EAST AREAS

headline.main: SPAIN ASSAILS SOVIET ON BESSARABIAN MOVE; Official Press Also Continues Campaign Against Britain

lead_paragraph: MADRID, June 30--Reverting once again to Russia as the principal enemy of Nationalist Spain, the newspaper Arriba today expressed regret over the annexation of Bessarabia.
